title: GDG DevFest 2016 Announced
brief: Google Developers Groups are proud to announce the annual GDG DevFest 2016 which is the biggest Google related event in Portugal carefully crafted by GDG community! The event will take place on **24th of September** in **Lisbon**.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: GDG DevFest Lisbon 2016 announced! The conference about Google technologies in Lisbon will take on **September 24** in Lisbon. That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](https://goo.gl/forms/1KQa9KKJne76zy3m1).
